attributes.action: Make travelling by train or bus free for under 18's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is barbaric as a british citizen who happens to be 16 to pay £5.90 per day to travel by train e.t.c to college or school. Certain people can not afford to do so. On behalf of teenagers aged 16 - 18 could this please be changed for there to be free useage of using trains for under 18's. This will then get more people using public transport instead of cars which will there by reduce carbon emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
